TopicTitle: Game can't get past loading screen

Articles.Content:
My game cant get past the loading screen, all it does is make it 3/4th of the way and crashes. can anyone help, here's my crash log via google drive: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1DoWVsWXHrp-1thLmXWIDXTqx7cGl4JYy?usp=sharing

Edited January 14, 2018 by Jack5.exe
The PEBKAC LES mod you have is for 1.2, and outdated mods (those utilising plugins, at any rate) are the most common cause of access violation crashes. Update it and try again.
